title: Raspberry Meringue Milkshake

ingredients.content: 200 g raspberries, frozen, plus extra to garnish

preparations.content: Place lemon zest and 60 g sugar in mixing bowl then grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place egg whites in mixing bowl and beat without measuring cup <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add 10 g sugar and beat again without measuring cup <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 3<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b> and transfer meringue to a bowl and set aside.

Place reserved ground sugar-lemon zest mixture, raspberries, yoghurt and milk in mixing bowl then blend <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer milkshake to glasses, spoon over the reserved meringue and garnish with raspberries. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Replace the frozen raspberries with any kind of berries: strawberries, blackberries, blueberries or mixture of berries.
Replace the meringue with whipped cream.
